description: Hello everyone! Today we're diving deep into two different liquidity design approaches in the DeFi space: TTSWAP's constant value formula with its "multi-pool integration" solution and Constant Product Formula's "virtual liquidity" solution. Through comparison, you'll understand how they enhance user trading experiences in different ways.
